qas.question: What is provided by BSNL and others throughout the state?
What is available in few cities?
Who are the cellular phone operators available?

answers.text: BSNL, Reliance Infocomm, Tata Indicom, Tata Docomo, Aircel, Vodafone, Idea Cellular and Airtel

qas.question: What is the name of the state-owned radio station?
What language does BSNL provide programs in?

plausible_answers.text: Shimla. BSNL, Reliance Infocomm, Tata Indicom, Tata Docomo, Aircel, Vodafone

qas.question: What are some of the available dial-up providers?
What is available in a few cities like Nepal?
What do Reliance Infocomm and Tata Indicom provide only to certain cities and towns?

context: <b5_0>Doordarshan<b5_0/> is the <a0_0>state-owned television broadcaster<a0_0/>. Doordarshan Shimla also provides programs in <b6_0>Pahari<b6_0/> language.Multi system operators provide a mix of Nepali, Hindi, English, and international channels via cable. All India Radio is a <a4_0>public radio station<a4_0/>. <a2_0><b8_0>Private FM stations<b8_0/><a2_0/> are also available in few cities like <b7_0>Shimla. <a3_0>BSNL, Reliance Infocomm, Tata Indicom, Tata Docomo, Aircel, Vodafone<b7_0/>, Idea Cellular and Airtel<a3_0/> are available cellular phone operators. <b9_0>Broadband internet<b9_0/> is available in select towns and cities and is provided by the state-run BSNL and by other private companies. <a1_0>Dial-up access<a1_0/> is provided throughout the state by BSNL and other providers.
